full_summary:
=====================================

# Request for Proposal: Ekahau Products or Equivalent

### Tender Information

| Title | 
| --- | 
| Ekahau Products or Equivalent | 

| Procurement Reference Number | SSC-23-00022313:T | 
| Solicitation Number | BPM018524/22313 | 

| Publication Date | March 15, 2023 | 
| Tender Closing Date | March 24, 2023 at 3:00 PM | 

| Tender Status | Expired | 

### Business Requirements

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking to procure Ekahau products or equivalent to support its WiFi testing requirements. The proposed solution should provide pinpoint accuracy for reliable and repeatable WiFi signal and spectrum data capture at various Government of Canada sites.

### Requirements

* Provide Ekahau SideKick ESK-2 WiFi testers that meet the required level of compatibility for this requirement.
* Ensure the software and hardware being procured are fully compatible and capable of integrating with the existing install base.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement opportunity is open to contractors under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

This procurement opportunity is open for contractors worldwide.

### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3, Canada
* Contact: Librada Oliver, [oliver.librada@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:oliver.librada@ssc-spc.gc.ca), 343-542-8460

### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be downloaded from the following links:

* [Ekahau Products or Equivalent - Amendment 000](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/D88B4368-D551-45A2-844D-B69494CF3DD2)
* [Ekahau Products or Equivalent - Amendment 000 (French)](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/BCDBD89F-D16D-4C65-AB65-021
